alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ada and western Boise Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 400 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Boise, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eagle, Hidden Springs and Bogus Basin Ski Area around 430 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
